item.title: By: Games Toaster
item.dc:creator: Games Toaster
item.description:
<strong>Intel buys Dublin games firm Havok...</strong>
Dublin games middleware company Havok is to be taken over by chip manufacturer Intel. The deal will see the company that grew out of Trinity College become a wholly-owned subsidiary of Intel. Havokâ€™s software tools have been used on games...
item.content:encoded:
Intel buys Dublin games firm Havok…

Dublin games middleware company Havok is to be taken over by chip manufacturer Intel. The deal will see the company that grew out of Trinity College become a wholly-owned subsidiary of Intel. Havokâ€™s software tools have been used on games…
